headline: American Express (AXP) Valuation Check After Strong Recent Shareholder Returns
summary: American Express (AXP) has drawn fresh attention after recent share price moves, as investors weigh its latest financial profile against long term return figures over the past year and the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for American Express. With the share price now at $383.56, American Express has recently seen stronger momentum, including an 18.45% 90 day share price return and a 1 year total shareholder return of 28.35%, hinting at shifting expectations around its growth and risk...
